title: Structure of the Neuromuscular Junction (End Plate)

questions.question: 1. In a skeletal muscle consisting of 1000 muscle fibres where every 10 fibers are innervated by a single neuron, how many motor units are in this muscle?
7. Which is the storage site for neurotransmitter before release?
8. At the NMJ:
options: The muscle membrane possesses muscarinic receptors.
There's a one-to-one transmission of excitatory impulses from the motor neuron to the muscle fibres it innervates
The motor nerve endings secrete noradrenaline
The typical summed end plate potential is usually 10 times the potential necessary to trigger an action potential

questions.question: True or false: The synaptic knob contains in its cytoplasm multiple synaptic vesicles which contain cholinesterase enzyme.
True or false: The synaptic gutter contains multiple voltage-gated Ca+2 channels.
True or false: The synaptic cleft contains the acetylcholinesterase enzyme.
